author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

This is a trivial PR, change title the histogram titles per resonance type in various instances of `DiMuonVertexMonitor` in `ALCARECOTkAlDQM`.

#### PR validation:

`cmssw` compiles

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

N/A
title: `ALCARECOTkAlDQM`: improve `DiMuonVertexMonitor` titles
